## JsPlumbListManager.addList() method

Configure the given element as a scrollable list.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
addList(el: Element, options?: JsPlumbListOptions): JsPlumbList;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  el | Element | Element to configure as a list. |
|  options | [JsPlumbListOptions](./browser-ui-lists.jsplumblistoptions) | Options for the list. |

<b>Returns:</b>

[JsPlumbList](./browser-ui-lists.jsplumblist)
